tool_description: An API showing all the latest news of Bitcoin around the world from all the major websites.

api_list.name: Get All Bitcoin News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the news across all major Bitcoin news sites from around the world.

api_list.name: Get Individual Bitcoin News Sources
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to get information for a specific news resource.

required_parameters.name: newspaperId
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the news source.
